attributes.action: Bring criminal charges of fraud against MPs involved in expenses scandals
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: While many MPs have "bent the rules", there appear to be certain grounds for prosecution against individuals who have for example, claimed twice on second homes, claimed for mortages which do not exist etc. This is fraud and these people should be investigated by the proper authorities.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
